attributes.action: Andy Coulson is guilty because he was in charge.  Why are government ministers who are in charge never even charged.
attributes.additional_details: There are hundreds of cases where members of, for example, the Home Office, have committed visa and passport crimes.  Why is it that the Home Secretary has never been charged, as the person in charge?  The judge today, in sentencing Andy Coulson only because he was in charge has set the precedent.  Will we now see CEOs of NHS hospitals being charged because their negligent nurses and doctors cause the death of NHS patients?
